tuv.seg: Going to post-primary school
Dul chun scoile iar-bhunoideachais
Life Event Document Starting post-primary school Describes post-primary education, including how to choose a post-primary school and enrol your child
Life Event Document Tosú ar iarbhunscoil Cur síos ar oideachais iarbhunscoile ina n-áirítear an dóigh chun iarbhunscoil a roghnú agus chun do pháiste a chlárú inti
Types of post-primary school
Cineálacha éagsúla scoileanna iarbhunoideachais
There are five different types of post-primary school
Tá cúig chineál scoile iarbhunoideachais ann
The main difference is in how your school is managed, how it is funded and who owns your school
Baineann na príomhdhifríochtaí leis an gcaoi a bhainistítear is a mhaoinítear na scoileanna agus cé leo iad
The first three-year period of second-level education is called the Junior Cycle
Cur síos ar an tSraith Shóisearach
This document describes the Transition Year programme, a one-year, school-based programme between Junior Cycle and Senior Cycle
Cur síos ar chlár na Bliana Idirmhéanaigh
This document describes the Senior Cycle in post-primary schools
Cur síos ar an tSraith Sinsearach i scoileanna dara leibhéil
Special needs education: post-primary
Oideachas riachtanas speisialta: oideachas iarbhunscoile
This document describes post-primary education for students with disabilities
Cur síos ar oideachas iarbhunscoile do mhic léinn atá faoi mhíchumas agus a bhfuil riachtanais speisialta oideachais acu
School transport for post-primary students
Scéim iompair do scoileanna dara-leibhéil
The Department of Education and Skills provides subsidised school transport for eligible post-primary students
Cuireann an Roinn Oideachais agus Scileanna cabhair airgid d’iompar scoile ar fáil do na scoláirí atá intofa don scéim Iompair Scoile
Organisations and resources for post-primary schools
Eagraíochtaí agus acmhainní le haghaidh iarbhunscoileanna
A list of organisations and internet resources providing information on education at post-primary level
Liosta eagraíochtaí agus acmhainní idirlín é seo a chuireann faisnéis ar fáil faoi chúrsaí oideachais ar an leibhéal iarbhunoideachais
Moving your children to secondary school
Do pháisté a aistriú chuig meánscoil Éireannach
Different schooling options available in the secondary school system in Ireland and outlines the state examination system
Tá cur síos anseo ar na roghanna sa chóras scoile ag an dara leibhéal in Éirinn agus ar an gcóras scruduithe Stáit
This document is in: Moving Country > Moving to Ireland > Introduction to the Irish System
This document is in: Ag bogadh tíre > Teacht go hÉirinn > Tús eolais ar chóras na hÉireann
Most Read in "Education and Training"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Oideachas agus Oiliúint"
School terms in primary and post-primary schools
Téarmaí scoile i mbunscoileanna agus iarbhunscoileanna
Further Education and Training (FET) allowances
Táillí do scoláirí tríú leibhéal
